main event: On 21 November 1957, an X-shaped illuminated object was observed at high altitude near Chocolate Mountain, north of Yuma, Arizona.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 60 minutes., The object was described as elongated in the horizontal axis with vertical lights., An aircraft flew directly underneath the object without any noticeable movement., The initial shape observed was circular but later reported as pear-shaped., There was insufficient data to definitively classify the object, though it was suggested it might be a military aircraft.
location: Visc, Chocalaite Mt., N of Yuma, Arizona
witness description: The observation was made from an aircraft by a military personnel.
